answers.author: Edward Shikada
answers.text:
Hi Heather - I'm not sure this fits the definition of informal, but I've attached a resource document in the hope it's helpful to you.  In San Jose we've had a mentoring program for many years, and it has typically run twice a year.  Please let me know if you have any questions; I can also get you Word docs if you'd like to modify any of this to your needs.  Good luck!  - Ed
